document.full_text: oliver perez said his dismal outing saturday, when he gave up homers to his first two batters, was the first time he had pitched on consecutive days.
document.title: as mets travel, perez stays behind, awaiting a possible last chance
lines_and_colors: oliver perez said his dismal outing saturday, when he gave up homers to his first two batters, was the first time he had pitched on consecutive days.
